page.title: 01Monkside and Wether Lair
page.content: {Monkside}and{Wether Lair}form the high points of a ridge which covers the greater part of this D-Block. The highest point is 513 metres above sea-level, at Monkside. the ridge runs in a north-east to south-west direction, with Kielder Forest just impinging on the most south-westerly corner. Smaller, more isolated plantations are to be found on the southern slopes of the ridge,near { {Little Monkside,Round Law and Hawke {Knowe}. The land is not otherwise cultivated, but sheep graze on the rough grasss and heather covered slopes. North of the ridge the water flows into{Ridge End Burn.}To the south,{ {Harper Burn,Hunter's Burn}and{ {Smallhope Burn}flow towards the{Tarset {Burn.}
